Entries.47360001/f Charlie 500/t 800 1100/M 2000: jaunty/9 9/farmer 11 9 0 GuntherWoods 4 10 0 Charlie 8 12 1/skippable/pause 1000/emote Charlie 40/pause 500/textAboveHead Charlie "Interesting..."/pause 1500/emote GuntherWoods 28/pause 1500/speak GuntherWoods "This isn't good...$s#$b# CHARLIE! Come here, please! We need to talk."/pause 700/speak Charlie "Ok, just let me finish this..."/pause 1500/emote Charlie 40/speak Charlie "Ok, I'm coming!"/pause 1000/move Charlie -5 0 0/move Charlie 0 -2 1/faceDirection GuntherWoods 3/speak GuntherWoods "So... #$b# About your payment, the Ferngill Government is trying to reduce costs. So this month, I'm sorry to say, but I can't pay you my nephew...$s"/pause 1000/shake Charlie 10/emote Charlie 12/speak Charlie "*mumbles* Almost every single month...$2"/speak GuntherWoods "Excuse me, Charlie? Can you speak louder?"/pause 700/emote Charlie 12/speak Charlie " I SAID THAT I CAN'T DO THIS ANYMORE!$5#$b# I DON'T HAVE ENOUGH MONEY TO LIVE! AND NOW THIS!$5"/emote GuntherWoods 16 true/emote farmer 16/speed farmer 3/jump farmer 8 true/move farmer 0 5 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 3 true/pause 700/speak GuntherWoods "Charlie, this isn't at my control now. We know that we have some problems with money, but you don't have to act like a kid.$a"/pause 700/question fork0 "What you should do?#Offer your money (-2000)#Pretend that you seemed nothing#"/fork Offermoney/playMusic none/pause 1000/move farmer 1 0 1 true/speak Charlie "Humph...$5#$b# I'll see what I can do for this month...$2"/move Charlie 0 5 0/warp Charlie -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/end dialogue GuntherWoods "I hope we get better soon...$s#$b# I hate this situation, we always have money trouble...$s"
Entries.Offermoney: pause 1000/emote Charlie 16 true/emote GuntherWoods 16/faceDirection Charlie 1 true/move GuntherWoods 0 1 1/speak Charlie "W-what...?$3"/pause 700/speak GuntherWoods "Are you sure @? We really could use some donations here.$h"/money -2000/pause 1000/emote Charlie 20/speak Charlie "Thank you @...$4#$b# And Gunther, with this money, we can finally take that project out of the paper!$h"/pause 500/emote GuntherWoods 16/pause 200/speak GuntherWoods "Probably, but I don't think that we can do this alone."/pause 500/faceDirection Charlie 0/speak Charlie "Oh right...#$b# But I will see what I can do..."/friendship Charlie 100/end
Entries.47360010/f Randy 500/t 1200 1800/d Tue W: jaunty/16 12/farmer 7 14 1 Wizard -100 -100 2 Jas 17 12 0 Vincent 18 12 0 Penny 18 9 2 Randy 10 12 3 Elliott 12 9 2 Charlie 8 11 1/skippable/animate Elliott false true 1820 32 33/animate Penny false true 1752 18 19/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 16/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 100/emote farmer 32/pause 100/emote Randy 16/pause 300/move farmer 0 -1 0 true/speak Randy "Hi @!$h#$b#Come just for letting an artifact to Gunther?"/message "You nod your head to say yes"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Randy 3/pause 400/speak Randy "I love books, they help me to speak better...#$b# Elliott is a great writer, but I think that he is afraid of me...$s#$b# I would love to write a book too!$l#$b# But I can't talk to people, they are always afraid of me, only Jas and Vincent are the ones that talk to me as I were a normal person...$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 400/question fork0 "Will you help him?#Yes, I will#It isn't my problem#"/fork Helprandy/pause 500/speak Randy "Well, it doesn't matter much...$s#$b# People will always have fear on me, no matter what...$s"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "You fell his problems crawling in your back"/pause 500/message "Looks like you will have a bad time in your dreams..."/pause 100/end
Entries.Helprandy: pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 400/emote farmer 40/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 400/move farmer 1 0 0 true/emote Randy 8/move farmer 0 -4 1/pause 500/speak Elliott "Oh greetings @, there is something that I can do for you?"/pause 400/emote farmer 40/message "You tell to Elliott that a fan of his writing is here"/pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "What!? Here!?$8#$b#I want to see him, get me to it!"/pause 500/stopAnimation Elliott 0/move farmer 0 4 2/move Elliott 0 4 2/move farmer -1 0 0/move Elliott -1 0 0/globalFade/viewport -100 -100/pause 1000/speak Wizard "@ started something...#$b#The prophecy was right...#$b#...?!!!$1#$b#@!#$b#What are you doing here?#$b#You're not supposed to be here... Perhaps she was right, you sure are something..."/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.47360003/f Charlie 1500/e 47360002/t 110: Crystal Bells/18 8/farmer -1000 -1000 0 Charlie 18 8 1 Randy 19 8 3/skippable/pause 1000/jump Randy 8/pause 500/textAbovehead Charlie "Great!"/pause 3000/jump Randy 8/pause 500/emote Randy 56/pause 500/speak Charlie "No Randy...$6#$b# I still can't take you to my home. Ghunter would kill me...$6"/pause 500/speak Randy "Alone... here...$s"/pause 500/emote Charlie 28/pause 500/textAbovehead Charlie "Randy please..."/pause 3000/warp farmer 18 13 0/pause 700/faceDirection Charlie 2/faceDirection Randy 2/pause 500/speak Randy "Someone! Play!$h"/jump Randy 8/pause 1000/jump Randy 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer -1 0 1 true/speak Charlie "Randy!$a#$b# Please, calm down!$a"/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/move Randy 0 1 3/pause 500/speak Randy "Human... friend?"/pause 500/question null "What should I do?#Say Yes#Stay quiet"/pause 1000/speak Charlie "Randy! Come here now!$a"/pause 500/move Randy 0 -1 3/pause 1000/emote Randy 28/speak Randy "Sorry...$s"/pause 1000/faceDirection Charlie 1/pause 500/warp Randy -1000 -1000/pause 500/playSound slime/faceDirection Charlie 2/pause 500/animate Charlie false true 1000 23 24/pause 1000/speak Charlie "Sorry for this @...$6#$b# Randy gets energy with other people."/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/message "You say that you aren't understanding..."/pause 500/emote Charlie 16/pause 500/speak Charlie "Oh, sorry.#$b# This little guy is Randy, my litte slime pet.#$b# He is diferent of the other types of slime that you can find here in the mines. As far as I know, he is the last one of his family.$s"/pause 1000/speak Randy "Papa... don't cry!$s"/pause 500/emote Charlie 28/pause 500/speak Charlie "I remember the day that I found him...$s#$b# He was at the mountain, alone and scared...$s"/stopAnimation Charlie/globalFade/viewport -500 -500/pause 1000/changeLocation Mountain/warp farmer -1000 -1000/warp Charlie 20 31/warp Randy 9 32/viewport 20 29/pause 1000/speak Randy "*snif* *snif*$s#$b# Papa... Mama...$s"/pause 500/emote Charlie 16/move Charlie -11 0 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Randy 0/emote Randy 16/pause 1000/speak Randy "Papa!$l"/pause 500/jump Charlie 8/pause 1000/speak Charlie "Wha...$3#$b# Me!? Papa?$3"/pause 500/jump Randy 8/pause 1000/jump Randy 8/pause 1000/emote Randy 20/pause 1000/emote Charlie 28/pause 500/speak Randy "Papa... hungry...$s"/pause 500/emote Charlie 28/pause 500/speak Charlie "What should I do...$3"/pause 1000/speak Randy "Home! Home! Take home!$h#$b# Pleeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaseeeeeee...$l"/pause 1000/emote Charlie 28/pause 500/textAbovehead Charlie "I can't with this cuteness"/pause 3000/textAbovehead Charlie "I'll take you with me!"/pause 3000/jump Randy 8/pause 500/jump Randy 8/pause 500/emote Randy 20/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -500 -500/changeLocation Mine/warp farmer 17 9/warp Charlie 18 8/warp Randy 19 8/viewport 18 8/faceDirection Randy 2/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Charlie "So, that was what happened...$h#$b# And now he is here!"/pause 500/speak Randy "Papa found me!$h"/pause 500/emote Charlie 28/pause 500/speak Charlie "The only problem, is that he lives here with no one...$6"/pause 1000/message "You hear Dwarf saying: 'So I am no one?!'"/pause 500/speak Charlie "OH SHUT UP DWARF!$a"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/question null "I know a place...#He could live in the store!"/pause 500/emote Charlie 16/pause 500/speak Charlie "That's right!$h#$b# I can build a place for him there!$h#$b# What do you think Randy?"/pause 500/speak Randy "Get out.. of here... good!$h"/pause 500/speak Charlie "Hahaha!$h#$b# He liked! Thank you @!$l"/pause 1000/end

Entries.47360004/f Charlie 2000/t 800 1200: none/35 7/farmer -1000 -1000 0 Charlie 30 5 2 Sandy -1000 -1001 0/pause 1000/animate Charlie false true 500 16 17 18/pause 2000/emote Charlie 40/pause 800/warp farmer 38 1/move farmer 0 4 3/move farmer -6 0 3/pause 800/emote Charlie 16/stopAnimation Charlie 2/pause 800/faceDirection Charlie 1/pause 800/speak Charlie "Hello @!#$b# I was just reading a bit to forget the life.#$b# By the way, how are you?"/pause 800/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Charlie "How I am?#$b# I'm good...$7"/pause 1000/emote farmer 60/pause 800/message "You notice the he isn't good. You ask the motive."/pause 800/showFrame Charlie 26/pause 800/speak Charlie "I think that you don't know but...$7#$b# Sandy is my half-sister.$7"/pause 800/emote farmer 16/pause 800/speak Charlie "You know why I live here in Pelican Town, and not with her?$s#$b# Our family is falling apart. My dad is gone since we where kids, no one knows where he is.$7#$b# So my mother weren't having the engouth money to sustent both of us, so I came here to live with Gunther, I consider him as my dad, since he was the person that took care of me.$7#$b# And Sandy stayed with her.$7#$b# Since then, we have lost contact, so I don't know where she lives now.$s"/pause 1000/emote farmer 60/pause 800/question fork1 "You have two choices, which one?#Bring Sandy here#Take Charlie to Sandy#"/fork Takehim/pause 800/emote farmer 16/pause 800/message "You say to Charlie wait here"/pause 800/speak Charlie "Ok so...$7"/pause 800/move farmer 6 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 0/warp farmer -1000 -1000/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -500 -500/pause 800/speak Charlie "What I'm going to do...$7"/changeLocation SandyHouse/warp farmer -1000 -1000 0/warp Sandy 2 5/viewport 4 6/pause 800/speak Sandy "All right, let's start cleaning!"/pause 500/move Sandy -1 0 0/textAboveHead Sandy "Sand everywhere..."/pause 3000/move Sandy 1 0 0/pause 800/warp farmer 4 9/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer -2 0 0 true/faceDirection Sandy 2/pause 800/speak Sandy "Oh! Hello @.#$b# What bring you here today?"/pause 800/emote farmer 60/pause 800/message "You explain everything about Charlie."/pause 800/emote Sandy 60/pause 800/speak Sandy "Oh...$2#$b# Him...$2#$b# You know...$2#$b# We don't talk that much anymore.$2#$b# I don't know if he want to see me again.$2"/pause 800/message "You insist"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Sandy "Ok so..."/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/speak Sandy "I hope this isn't a waste of time @...$2"/pause 1000/changeLocation Beach/warp Charlie 30 5/warp farmer -1000 -100/warp Sandy -1000 -1000/faceDirection Charlie 1/viewport 35 7/pause 800/emote Charlie 28/pause 800/speak Charlie "@ is taking too long...$7"/pause 800/warp farmer 38 1/move farmer 0 4 3/warp Sandy 38 1/move farmer -6 0 3 true/speak Charlie "Finally @!$7#$b# Where yoe were this hole time?$a"/pause 800/message "You say to him stay calm. Because you want to show someone"/pause 800/emote Charlie 40/pause 800/move farmer 0 2 0/move Sandy 0 4 3/move Sandy -6 0 3 true/emote Charlie 16/speak Charlie "S-Sandy...?$8"/pause 800/speak Sandy "Charlie...#$b# About time, isn't?"/pause 800/emote Charlie 20/emote Sandy 20/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Charlie "Thank you @...$l"/message "I think that these two need a time alone."/mail Sandyisback/end
Entries.Takehim: pause 1000/message "You say to Charlie that you know where Sandy is."/pause 800/faceDirection Charlie 1/pause 800/emote Charlie 16/pause 800/speak Charlie "Really @?$8#$b# Take me there! Please!$8"/globalFade/viewport -500 -500/pause 1000/changeLocation SandyHouse/viewport 4 6/warp Sandy 2 5 0/faceDirection Sandy 2/warp farmer -100 -100/warp Charlie -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp farmer 4 9 0/playSound doorClose/pause 800/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer -2 0 0 true/speak Sandy "Hello @.#$b#What are you going to buy today?"/pause 800/message "You say to Sandy that someone is here to see her"/pause 800/speak Sandy "Well, tell to this person come inside!"/pause 800/warp Charlie 4 9 0/playSound doorClose/pause 800/emote Sandy 16/speak Sandy "Charlie..."/pause 800/speak Charlie "Sandy...$8"/pause 800/move Charlie 0 -4 0/faceDirection Sandy 1/faceDirection Charlie 3/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Sandy and Charlie now are talking, better I let them there."/speak Charlie "Thank you @...$l"/mail Charlieisback/end

Entries.Sandyisback: Hello @,^I would like to say that I thank you.^Me and Sandy are happier than ever.^You're the best person that I know!	^	-Charlie[#]Charlie thanks
Entries.Charlieisback: Hey sweety,^Thank you for doing this. I wish that I could say it in person.^But I have some family things to do now.^Thank you @	^	-Sandy[#]Sandy thanks
Entries.Charlieinvite: Hello @,^Please come to my shop on any Wednesday.^There is something that you need to see, and we need to talk.	^	-Charlie[#]Charlie Invitation
Entries.Randyshop: Hi dear,^Please come to our shop on any day, by the morning, I know that I could say to you.^But, it's important. I think that is time for to Randy learns to run the shop.	^	-Charlie[#]Randy is ready
Entries.MeetRandy: Hi @,^you're the only person that I trust to keep a secret.^Come to the mines any day, during the lunchtime.^Someone want to meet you.	^	-Charlie[#]Meet Someone
Entries.Shopfixing: Hello @!^You know that part of the museum that is closed?^Come there as soon as you can, I need to talk to you.^^	-Charlie[#]Wrecked Shop
